long_description: Designed exclusively for stationary bikes and trainers, the Delta Cycle Mini Tablet Caddy features a wide platform to fit an iPad Mini or other small tablet and offers easy viewing while training. Delta Cycle Mini Tablet Caddy is also compatable with the Kindle Fire, Nexus 7, Samsung Galaxy 7 or any other device with maximum dimensions of 7.87 x 5.4 x 0.4 in. Plastic construction stands up to wear and tear; rubber bumpers grip and cushion your device. Includes handlebar and stem mounts; felt bumpers are included to customize the fit between various phones and cases. Viewing angle can be set to your preference.
short_description: Designed exclusively for stationary bikes and trainers, the Delta Cycle Mini Tablet Caddy features a wide platform to fit an iPad Mini or other small tablet and offers easy viewing while training.
